name: Detox ( TriJam 118)
description:
Born a poor light-sensitive and corrosive slime, your only goal is to drink the water from humans as if they were juice boxes and find your way out of the lab! Find a way to absorb enough water to escape the lab before your material composition becomes too toxic to sustain your existence!

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys. Slime can float by reversing the effects of gravity on itself!

Interact: E key (Cancel intro dialog)

Bugs:

Currently the death of the slime doesn't have a working transition and loops. Restarting the page is the only way to restart currently. Sorry!

Credits & Honorable Mentions:

As our first game on itch.io, it's been a delightful experience. Here's to many more!
